评论概述: Not a great fit for me
评论详情: Dress was heavy and frumpy for my small frame. Loved the color but material was too much. Returned dress and other no problem for a full refund.
I wanted to like this, it’s not good .  One sleeve was stretched out and just hangs.  This is cheap looking so I say don’t waste your time thinking this dress will work.

I bought this dress for an event and got compliments all day. Very comfortable, breathable and true to size. I'm a size 8/10 and the medium fit perfectly. Super comfortable. It's short girl friendly. I'm 5'3 and with flats it was at my ankles.
I got a larger but it was a little tight in the bust. My bra size ie a 34G. I love love this dress.
Runs true to size so the large don’t work. Needed an XL, but sadly unavailable .
Mother's 90th birthday color were rosegold and gold. Perfect color and the rose overlay set it off with smoke see through heels. Perfect lots of compliments.
